Rent your first tool free for a day*

At Your Service

Lend

Earn more than 10% of the value of your tool in just one day. All your tools are fully insured and being rented by screened individuals and companies.

Borrow

You now have access to that tool for a fraction of the cost. Connect with a trusted source within your community to rent the tool from their collection at a price that is often more than half the price or traditional rental

Save Money, Make Money

Tooli gives you the opportunity to complete every job more efficiently and effectively so you can already start thinking about the next project.

We've got what you need!

Debating if you should buy a tool or rent it for your next project because the rental cost is so high?

Tooli makes that decision easier. Buy the tool and turn it into an income producing asset or rent it from someone local in your network for a fraction of the cost. It’s a win-win for everyone!

Rent out your tools

  • 1

    Create an account

    Simply login through Google or e-mail to get started. Setup a profile so we know how to get money to you.
  • 2

    List your tools

    List all your tools that you’d like to rent. Provide the required details and use the app to take a picture of your tool. Rent it out for the price you want.
  • 3

    Manage bookings

    If you need the tool for yourself or it’s not available, simply mark on the calendar when it’s not available. Have all your bookings in an easy to update format.
  • 4

    Review the borrower

    Your tools have been treated with love. Make sure the person renting them does the same by reviewing the borrower. Just to make sure though, your tools are also fully insured.

Borrow any tool

  • 1

    Select the category

    Pick the appropriate category for the type of project you’re working on.
  • 2

    Select the tool

    Find the right tool, at the right price at the right location convenient for you..
  • 3

    Read details and reviews

    Read the details of the tool to make sure it’s appropriate for what you need. Read past reviews to ensure other have had a good experience with that exact tool.
  • 4

    Book the tool

    Contact the tool owner with any other questions and confirm a pickup location for the tool. Book the tool and it’s ready to be used.
